name: get_city_detail
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool geoapi.
Tool description: APIs to get data based on city and countries name.
- Get Country Details : Get country deatils with country name. Use prefix = true for prefix match.
- Get Cities in a Country :  Get cities in a country wiht population minimum and maximum filter. 
- Get City Detail :  Get city details with city name.
API description: Fetch detailed information about a city using its name via the RapidAPI service.

name.description: The name of the city for which details are to be fetched.
